v8:item.v8:content: BF='On 1C:Enterprise server'; BT='On this computer or LAN computer'
On this computer or LAN computer
Direct infobase connection is not supported by applications that run on Linux.
Before you export data, read exchange rules.

Debugging tools are unavailable in the web client.
Do not import data automatically on form open
Debugging tools are unavailable in the web client.
Toggles safe mode for data conversion rules. It is recommended that you export and import data in safe mode. For more information about the safe mode, see 1C:Enterprise documentation.
Use optimized data exchange format (V8–V8, data processor version 2.0.18 or later)
Export only objects allowed by access rights
Automatically delete invalid characters when writing to XML
Delete records only for exported metadata objects
Import log on server (for COM connections)
Data deletion is intended for debugging only. Do NOT use it for other purposes.
Delete only objects allowed by access rights
Metadata object change tracking options after export
Read exchange rules from a file.
Clear exchange nodes for all items.
Assign exchange node for all items
Assign the current exchange node for all items.
